prompts: Create a sleek cat-like Pokemon that is primarily blue with white accents.
I want a psychic-type Pokemon with elegant features and a playful attitude.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon that has striking yellow eyes and large ears.
Make a unique Pokemon with psychic abilities that loves to explore urban areas.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a mystical creature, combining blue and white colors.
Design a Pokemon that is agile and prefers to live in grassy regions.
Show me a cute and clever Pokemon with a distinct personality and whimsical charm.
